Dinobot followed and stayed at Elder's side.

Jotunn: Please, Milord... I h=
ave lost the right to that title. But the
Airtankers are the Iron Skull Lor=
ds now. And yes, they are part of my
plan. They are my plan.

Motherload: Y=
eah... Let's just hope everything goes right with it.

She was visibly depr=
essed but resigned at the same time. They all
looked that way.

Dinobot: An=
d [grunt] what might be that plan?

Jotunn: You might know the Airtankers a=
re combiners; they formed up
the Airtank vehicle form at the battle in Rela=
y. They also combine to
form up Stormblaze.

Bombtube: [Very uncheerfully] =
Whoop-dee-doo...

Jotunn: Stormblaze was made to be about as powerful as Pr=
edaking used
to be, perhaps even more.

Dinobot: But wasn't Predaking a Dec=
epticon? Aren't you all Predacons now?

Motherload: Yeah and yeah. Thing is=
, Stormblaze is so powerful she's
unstable. We all lose our personality whe=
n we merge and we don't have
any clue of what we're doing.

Jotunn: So this=
 is the main axis of my plan.
